mapper.select: SELECT category,skin_title,skin_interpretation_old,skin_interpretation_new, common_problems,skin_Tips, prompt1,prompt1_id,prompt1_advice, prompt2,prompt2_id,prompt2_advice, prompt3,prompt3_id,prompt3_advice, prompt4,prompt4_id,prompt4_advice, prompt5,prompt5_id,prompt5_advice, prompt6,prompt6_id,prompt6_advice, prompt7,prompt7_id,prompt7_advice, prompt8,prompt8_id,prompt8_advice, prompt9,prompt9_id,prompt9_advice, tags, like_good FROM hq_nursing_guidelines WHERE category=#{skin,jdbcType=VARCHAR};

SELECT id as entityId,category,skin_title,skin_interpretation_old,skin_interpretation_new, common_problems,skin_Tips, prompt1,prompt1_advice,prompt1_content, prompt2,prompt2_advice,prompt2_content, prompt3,prompt3_advice,prompt3_content, prompt4,prompt4_advice,prompt4_content, prompt5,prompt5_advice,prompt5_content, prompt6,prompt6_advice,prompt6_content, prompt7,prompt7_advice,prompt7_content, prompt8,prompt8_advice,prompt8_content, prompt9,prompt9_advice,prompt9_content, like_good, tags FROM hq_nursing_guidelines;
SELECT CONCAT_WS(",",prompt1_id,prompt2_id,prompt3_id,prompt4_id,prompt5_id,prompt6_id,prompt7_id,prompt8_id,prompt9_id) as pro_id FROM hq_nursing_guidelines WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `hq_nursing_guidelines` ( category, skin_title, skin_interpretation_old, skin_interpretation_new, common_problems, skin_Tips, prompt1, prompt1_id, prompt1_advice, prompt1_content, prompt2, prompt2_id, prompt2_advice, prompt2_content, prompt3, prompt3_id, prompt3_advice, prompt3_content, prompt4, prompt4_id, prompt4_advice, prompt4_content, prompt5, prompt5_id, prompt5_advice, prompt5_content, prompt6, prompt6_id, prompt6_advice, prompt6_content, prompt7, prompt7_id, prompt7_advice, prompt7_content, prompt8, prompt8_id, prompt8_advice, prompt8_content, prompt9, prompt9_id, prompt9_advice, prompt9_content, like_good ) VALUES (#{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skin_title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skin_interpretation_old,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skin_interpretation_new,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{common_problems,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skin_Tips,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prompt1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{prompt1_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prompt1_advice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prompt1_content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prompt2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{prompt2_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prompt2_advice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prompt2_content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prompt3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{prompt3_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prompt3_advice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prompt3_content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prompt5_advice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prompt5_content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prompt6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{prompt6_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prompt6_advice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prompt6_content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prompt7,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{prompt7_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prompt7_advice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prompt7_content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
